title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 4 - How to Patch a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Patching a lay flat header pipe
subtasks: Make a precise cut over the leak
Prepare the coupling or bob splice fitting
Apply clamps to both sides of the pipe
Insert the fitting into the pipe
Align and push pipe parts over the fitting
Use vaseline or vegetable oil for smooth sliding
Position pipe clamps past the barbs
Test the repair by turning on water
